metadata.synopsis: There are number of pile of fallen withered skeletons in greenish armors of Emerald Enclave.They are remains from the past war with Ketheric and his Justiciars

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Fallen members of the Emerald Enclave. Casualties in the war against Ketheric Thorm, years past.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *The old remains sport green armour and garb. What banner did they march under?*
